Class TestResult

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.tap4j.model.TapElement

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class TestResult
extends TapResult
    A simple test result. Valid values are OK and NOT OK.
    Since:
    1.0
